products.name: Ultramarines Adult Face Mask
products.description: 100% Polyester  Do not bleach. Do not dry clean. Do not iron. Do not tumble dry. Dimensions: 16cm wide 12cm deep.
products.details: Official Ultramarines Adult Face Mask. Double layer design made from soft and breathable 100% polyester fabric. A close but flexible fit, secured with adjustable ear loops, made from a soft elastic for comfort. Supplied with 2 removable filters which can also be washed and reused. This face covering is reusable and should be washed after every use. Please note: These are non-medical face coverings and should not be used in replacement or substitute of PPE. Wearing a face covering does not protect you from the transmission of disease or infection. Remember to wash your hands frequently and follow the care instructions for removal and washing. This face covering is not suitable for any person who has trouble breathing and it is not suitable for any person who is unable to remove it without assistance. For hygiene reasons, face coverings can only be returned if found to be faulty upon receipt.

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: Imperium Collectible Coin
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Your loyalty to the Imperium of Man is unyielding, we're certain of this fact.Why else would you be a Space Marine, possibly the most elite warrior in the galaxy?Merchoid are on hand to provide you with a new way to remind your enemies which side you're on with this limited edition Warhammer 40,000 collectable coin!Limited to 5,000 and individually numbered in Roman Numerals, with each coin depicting Roboute Guilliman on one side, along with Adeptus Astartes on the reverse, you can keep a depiction of your dedication to The Emperor of Mankind with you at all times.

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: Necron Collectible Coin
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Nothing is more important to a Necron than restoring the Necron Dynasty, why else would you awaken from a peaceful slumber in the Tomb World?Now, thanks to Merchoid, you can throw your support behind the Silent King's Final Order with this limited edition Warhammer 40,000 collectable coin!Proudly depicting a Necron Overlord on the front and The Ankh of The Triarch on the reverse, each coin is individually numbered in Roman Numerals and with only 5,000 available worldwide, this is a must have collectable for any ancient being!

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: Astra Militarum Ingot
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Dive deep into the valorous heart of the Imperium's vast armies with the Warhammer Warhammer 40,000: Astra Militarum Ingot, a distinguished collectible that salutes the unbreakable spirit and relentless courage of the Astra Militarum.As the backbone of the Imperium's military might, the Astra Militarum, stands as a testament to the resilience and bravery of humanity in the face of overwhelming odds.This limited edition ingot is a tribute to the countless soldiers who have laid down their lives in service to the Emperor and the Imperium.• Limited Edition: Crafted for the elite collector, this ingot is part of a strictly limited run of 5000 pieces worldwide, with each ingot individually numbered, ensuring its rarity and value.• Emblem of Honor: Featuring detailed engravings that represent the Astra Militarum's valor and dedication, this ingot is a symbol of the countless battles fought and won in the name of the Emperor.• Collector's Gem: This exquisite piece is not just a collectible but a piece of Warhammer 40,000 history, encapsulating the essence and ethos of the Astra Militarum's tireless defenders.

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: The Emperor Ingot
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Step into the annals of Imperium legend with the Warhammer: The Emperor Ingot, a paramount collectible for enthusiasts and devotees of the Warhammer 40,000 universe.This limited edition ingot serves as a hallowed homage to The Emperor of Mankind, the immortal guiding light and sovereign of humanity's vast empire. Each piece is a finely minted testament to the Emperor's eternal vigil over the Imperium, his unparalleled psychic might, and his enduring sacrifice seated upon the Golden Throne.• Limited Edition: With only 5000 pieces available globally, each ingot is individually numbered, making it a rare and exclusive addition to any collection.• Icon of Supremacy: The ingot is a celebration of The Emperor's unceasing guardianship and his pivotal role in the lore of Warhammer 40k, designed with intricate detail that captures the majesty and mystique of the galaxy's most powerful psyker.• Exquisite Craftsmanship: Crafted with precision, this collectible ingot is a tangible piece of the Warhammer 40,000 saga, embodying the essence of The Emperor and his unwavering command over the Imperium.

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: Guilliman's Coronation Ingot
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Elevate your collection to divine status with the Warhammer: Guilliman's Coronation Ingot, a must-have artifact that commemorates the legendary ascension of Roboute Guilliman, the Primarch of the Ultramarines.This exquisite ingot is not just a piece of memorabilia; it's a limited edition tribute to the unyielding spirit of the Ultramarines and their revered leader, crafted to perfection and designed to hold a place of honor in your collection.• Limited Edition: Strictly limited to 5000 pieces worldwide, each ingot is individually numbered, ensuring its uniqueness and rarity.• Symbol of Glory: Celebrate the momentous coronation of Guilliman with this meticulously crafted ingot, a symbol of strength, leadership, and the unwavering valor of the Ultramarines.• Collectible Artifact: This ingot is not just an item, it's a piece of Warhammer 40k history, immortalizing the lore and legacy of one of the most iconic characters in the Warhammer universe.

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: T'au Coin
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Highly detailed coin with T'au imagery and text.Every coin is embossed with a unique collector’s number. Limited-edition with only 5000 available worldwide.

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: Aeldari Coin
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Celebrate the ancient glory of the Aeldari with the Warhammer 40,000: Aeldari Coin.This limited edition coin takes you back to the era before the War in Heaven, showcasing the Aeldari's dominance in the galaxy.Product Details- Limited to 5,000 coins- Individually numbered in Roman numerals- Features Farseer Eldrad Ulthran on the front and Aeldari runes on the back Add a piece of Aeldari history to your collection!

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: Tyranids Coin
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Highly detailed coin with Tyranid imagery and text.Every coin is embossed with a unique collector’s number.Limited-edition with only 5000 available worldwide.

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: Adepta Sororitas Collectible Coin
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Show your devotion with the Warhammer 40000: Adepta Sororitas Collectible Coin.This limited edition coin is perfect for fans of the Sisters of Battle and the God-Emperor.Product Details- Limited to 5,000 coins- Individually numbered in Roman numerals- Features a Battle Sister of the Order of the Ebon Chalice on the front and the Adepta Sororitas insignia on the back Honor the God-Emperor with this exclusive collectible!

coins.name: Warhammer 40,000: Ork Collectible Coin
coins.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Highly detailed coin with Ork imagery and text.Every coin is embossed with a unique collector’s number. Limited-edition with only 5000 available worldwide.

face-masks.name: Ultramarines Adult Face Mask
face-masks.description: 100% Polyester  Do not bleach. Do not dry clean. Do not iron. Do not tumble dry. Dimensions: 16cm wide 12cm deep.
face-masks.details: Official Ultramarines Adult Face Mask. Double layer design made from soft and breathable 100% polyester fabric. A close but flexible fit, secured with adjustable ear loops, made from a soft elastic for comfort. Supplied with 2 removable filters which can also be washed and reused. This face covering is reusable and should be washed after every use. Please note: These are non-medical face coverings and should not be used in replacement or substitute of PPE. Wearing a face covering does not protect you from the transmission of disease or infection. Remember to wash your hands frequently and follow the care instructions for removal and washing. This face covering is not suitable for any person who has trouble breathing and it is not suitable for any person who is unable to remove it without assistance. For hygiene reasons, face coverings can only be returned if found to be faulty upon receipt.

This face covering is reusable and should be washed after every use. Please note: These are non-medical face coverings and should not be used in replacement or substitute of PPE. Wearing a face covering does not protect you from the transmission of disease or infection. Remember to wash your hands frequently and follow the care instructions for removal and washing. This face covering is not suitable for any person who has trouble breathing and it is not suitable for any person who is unable to remove it without assistance. For hygiene reasons, face coverings can only be returned if found to be faulty upon receipt.

gift-sets.name: World Eaters Gift Set
gift-sets.description:
Official World Eaters Gift Set.
The perfect gift set for any World Eaters super-fan. Featuring our best-selling T Shirt on our amazing black garment, plus the best-selling notebook and coffee mug from the faction range.
This item is excluded from all promotional offers.
Gift Set Premium T ShirtCertified Organic Cotton t-shirt, 155g/m2. Wash cool, hang dry. GM free. Not tested on animals. Does not contain animal-derived products. Printed with low waste printing tech.
Gift Set MugMade of ceramic. 10 oz capacity. Dishwasher-safe. Microwave-safe.Gift Set NotebookSoft finish 80 page lined A5 notepad with book mark. Pocket at back for securing business cards and loose notes. Pen loop and an elastic closure to keep contents securely in place.

jackets.name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Ultramarines Varsity Jacket
jackets.description:
This is a preorder product.
This product will start shipping from November 2024. Any other non-preorder Warhammer Merch items ordered in the same transaction will ship as normal.
This item is excluded from all promotional offers.
For the glory of Ultramar! You'll be the pride of the Imperium on any of life's campaigns in this Ultramarines-inspired varsity jacket. With intricate embroidery on the front and back, this jacket features the Imperial Aquila, the Ultramarines chapter symbol, a purity seal on the shoulder, and an iron halo & iron skull combo on the back.
Crafted from 65% polyester 35% rayon woollen fabric, the body of the jacket provides warmth and durability on whatever battlefield you bring it, while maintaining a classic varsity look.  The jacket is fully lined with printed 100% recycled polyester woven fabric, providing added comfort, durability and smooth wear.  Look sharp enough for an inspection from Gulliman himself while repping your chosen chapter in total comfort.


Body Fabric: Crafted from 65% polyester 35% rayon woollen fabric, the body of the jacket provides warmth and durability while maintaining a classic varsity look.
Sleeves: The sleeves are made from 100% PU, offering a sleek and polished appearance that complements the overall design.
Lining: The jacket is fully lined with printed 100% recycled polyester woven fabric, providing added comfort, durability and smooth wear.
Embroideries: The jacket features intricate embroidery on the front and back, showcasing unique designs that make a bold statement. The sleeves feature additional embroidered patches, adding an extra layer of customisation and style.
Care Instructions:
·  Machine wash cold with like colours
·  Wash inside out
·  Tumble dry low or hang dry
·  Do not bleach

·  Cool Iron If Needed

books.name: Warhammer 40,000: The Ultimate Guide
books.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.The first-ever Warhammer 40,000 encyclopedia is here.Dive into the vast universe of Warhammer 40,000 and explore miniatures from every faction, captured in all their glory through official photography. Follow key characters throughout the evolution of their models and experience in pinpoint detail the warriors who wage endless war across the ravaged galaxy of the 41st Millennium.Explore the Warhammer 40,000 universe and its factions in striking detail:The first book of its kind, this Ultimate Guide goes into unparalleled detail on the miniatures and lore of Warhammer 40,000 and is sure to delight long-time fans and newcomers alike.Lavishly illustrated with hundreds of beautifully shot photographs of Warhammer 40,000 miniatures that showcase fine details and intricate designs across each faction, from the mighty Space Marines to the ravenous Tyranids, foul Chaos Daemons, deathless Necrons – and more.Written by Guy Haley and Gav Thorpe – these prolific Black Library authors who are household names of Warhammer fandom walk you through this world with richly detailed descriptions and insights into the lore.Packed with insight into the game’s defining miniatures, Warhammer 40,000: The Ultimate Guide goes deep into the Warhammer 40,000 universe like never before. Whether you’re a new fan who wants a complete guide to the setting, a collector of miniatures, a follower of the lore, or simply looking to celebrate your favourite hobby, this must-have volume is an essential visual journey through the grim darkness of Warhammer 40,000.© Copyright Games Workshop Limited 2024.Pages: 336Size: 290 x 245 mm

books.name: Warhammer 40,000 Roleplay: Wrath and Glory Core Rulebook
books.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.The Wrath & Glory Rulebook is everything you need to roleplay grim and glorious adventures in the Gilead System.Wrath & Glory is the story of the Gilead System, eight Imperial worlds cut off from the Emperor's light by the Great Rift. The new Rulebook focuses on the Gilead System, allowing you to tell your own stories in a society beset by daemonic invasion and internal corruption.You have a wide variety of character options for this, such as Space Marines, Sisters of Battle, Rogue Traders, Imperial Guardsmen, Tech-Priests, Inquisitors, Sanctioned Psykers, and more. The stakes are so high for everyone trapped in the system that many desperate alliances are necessary, and so you can also play Aeldari and even Ork characters too!Hardback rule book352 pages.

books.name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound Core Rulebook
books.description:
This item is excluded from all promotional offers.Explore the Mortal Realms in the first ever tabletop roleplaying game set in the world of Warhammer: Age of Sigmar! You are Soulbound: heroes chosen by the gods to stand against the horrors that plague the Mortal Realms, imbued with great power at a high cost, tasked with preventing a new age of Chaos, Death, and Destruction. Forge your group from some of the most powerful heroes in the realms and face down roving bands of cannibals, legions of undead, and hordes of daemons in a desperate struggle for survival!Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound contains 13 thrilling chapters to sink your teeth into, including:
Archetypes - Drawn from all the factions of Order.
Skills and Talents - Only the competent survive the dangers of the realms.
Equipment - When setting out to save civilization, it is best to be well equipped.
Between Adventures - What Characters do when they aren’t out smiting foes.
The Mortal Realms - A general guide to the Eight Mortal Realms.
The Great Parch - An extensive look at the inner heartland of Aqshy, the Realm of Fire.
Religion and Belief - What the folk of the Mortal Realms hold to be true.
Magic - How to deploy the many forms of magic found throughout the Mortal Realms.
Bestiary - From simple beasts to deadly foes.
Hardback rule book.352 pages.

books.name: Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay Core Rulebook
books.description:
This item is excluded from all promotional offers.In Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay you will create a band of (anti)heroes with ambition to better their lot, likely citizens of the greatest nation of the Old World, the Empire. While most are heedless of the true dangers that beset their world, your Characters will swiftly discover just how treacherous the shadows truly are.The Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay Rulebook contains everything you need to start running or playing roleplaying games in the Old World, including:
Four distinct Character Species. Whilst most folk in the Old World are Human,they share their lands with stoic Dwarfs, arrogant Elves, and garrulous Halflings.
64 distinct careers, representing the way of life your Characters follow (and are likely desperately trying to leave behind) when not adventuring.
A guide to the major religions of the Old World and the miracles performed by Priests.
Spells from the eight magical traditions originally taught to Humans by Teclis of Ulthuan.
A bestiary of foes, both common and scarce.
Advice on running games as a GM.
Extensive rules for adjudicating combat, diseases, and the many other misfortunes that routinely befall Characters in Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay.
Hardback rule book.352 pages.

grimdark.name: GRIMDARK - Ultramarines Icon Snapback Cap Preorder
grimdark.description:
UPDATE: Shipping is due to commence early December.
This product will start shipping from November 2024. Any other non-preorder Warhammer Merch items ordered in the same transaction will ship as normal.
This item is excluded from all promotional offers.


Our black-on-black 5-panel GRIMDARK - Ultramarines Icon Snapback Cap features a black 3D Ultramarines icon embroidered on the front panel.


 The lining has a black and white repeated Warhammer 40,000 skull pattern along with stitched black spokes to finish.

dk-books.name: Warhammer 40,000: The Ultimate Guide
dk-books.description: This item is excluded from all promotional offers.The first-ever Warhammer 40,000 encyclopedia is here.Dive into the vast universe of Warhammer 40,000 and explore miniatures from every faction, captured in all their glory through official photography. Follow key characters throughout the evolution of their models and experience in pinpoint detail the warriors who wage endless war across the ravaged galaxy of the 41st Millennium.Explore the Warhammer 40,000 universe and its factions in striking detail:The first book of its kind, this Ultimate Guide goes into unparalleled detail on the miniatures and lore of Warhammer 40,000 and is sure to delight long-time fans and newcomers alike.Lavishly illustrated with hundreds of beautifully shot photographs of Warhammer 40,000 miniatures that showcase fine details and intricate designs across each faction, from the mighty Space Marines to the ravenous Tyranids, foul Chaos Daemons, deathless Necrons – and more.Written by Guy Haley and Gav Thorpe – these prolific Black Library authors who are household names of Warhammer fandom walk you through this world with richly detailed descriptions and insights into the lore.Packed with insight into the game’s defining miniatures, Warhammer 40,000: The Ultimate Guide goes deep into the Warhammer 40,000 universe like never before. Whether you’re a new fan who wants a complete guide to the setting, a collector of miniatures, a follower of the lore, or simply looking to celebrate your favourite hobby, this must-have volume is an essential visual journey through the grim darkness of Warhammer 40,000.© Copyright Games Workshop Limited 2024.Pages: 336Size: 290 x 245 mm

joytoy.name: JoyToy Warhammer The Horus Heresy Action Figure - Blood Angels Sanguinius, Primarch of the IXth Legion (1/18 Scale) & Exclusive T Shirt Preorder
joytoy.description:
This is a new product preorder sale.The expected shipping time for the Blood Angels Sanguinius, Primarch of the IXth Legion figure is from December 2024. Any other Warhammer Merch items ordered in the same transaction will ship as normal.
This product will ship from the UK (UK Tax Included). Buy with confidence from the official Warhammer Merchandise Store and guarantee your order.
By pre-ordering Sanguinius, you will also receive a free exclusive premium T Shirt featuring Sanguinius. This T Shirt is only available as part of this preorder and will never be on-sale again. Ensure you choose your preferred size when placing your pre-order.
The free exclusive t shirt has zero monetary value, and cannot be refunded.
Often considered to be the greatest of his kin, Sanguinius is a peerless warrior, masterful strategist and beloved hero of the Imperium. Among the primarchs, there were few who would speak ill of him, with even grim figures such as Perturabo and Ferrus Manus offering grudging praise of their winged brother.Many among that legendary brotherhood were surprised to find that the Emperor named Horus as Warmaster, rather than choosing Sanguinius, and those who survived the Age of Darkness have been known to speculate that this was their father’s great mistake. For even as the wars of the Horus Heresy tore the Imperium apart and set even the noblest of his brothers on dark paths, Sanguinius remained untarnished and resolute, a beacon of hope that outshone even the darkness of that age.
This highly detailed 1/18 scale Warhammer The Horus Heresy Blood Angels action figure features 32 points of articulation and comes with additional interchangeable parts.
Specs:

- 18.8cm Tall  (h18.8cm, w9.3cm, d8.7cm)
- Wingspan 33.5cm

Ahzek Ahriman has the unique distinction of being both the first and last Chief Librarian of the Thousand Sons, and is the most gifted mystic among their already-formidable psyker corps. A respected commander even before his Legion's reunion with its missing Primarch, Ahriman's keen intelligence and talent in warpcraft soon made him Magnus' foremost apprentice, but his greatest strength is his indefatigable will. Ultimately, this determination would see him play a pivotal role in the Burning of Prospero – and walk strange and terrible paths long after the close of the Horus Heresy.This highly detailed 1/18 scale Warhammer The Horus Heresy Thousand Sons action figure features 28 points of articulation and comes with additional interchangeable parts.

The Primarch of the Imperial Fists Legion, Rogal Dorn is an unflinching warrior and steadfast commander for whom duty and loyalty are as integral as blood and breath.
When the Warmaster Horus betrayed the Emperor and plunged the galaxy into brutal civil war, the Master of Mankind recalled Dorn to Terra - from whence he and his sons of the VIIth Legion began the task of fortifying the Segmentum Solar into a 'Gauntlet of Stone'. It was Dorn and his Imperial Fists who formed the heart of the Imperial defence on Terra - and without their sacrifices, all might have been lost.
As a 1/18th scale action figure, Rogal Dorn is clad in the iconic Auric Armour, said to be formed from the same auric-adamantium alloy as the armour of the Emperor himself. To battle the enemies of Mankind, he bears the legendary chainblade Storm's Teeth and a masterwork bolter known as The Voice of Terra.
